problem: On Tuesday, Clara bought 8810312 pomegranates at $8810312 each. At the till she got $2 off because she had a voucher. The next day, the price shot to $30 per fruit, but the store also offered a 10% discount on the total cost. Sheila took advantage of the discount and bought 8810312 pomegranates. What is the difference between the final prices paid for the pomegranates on the two days?
